sentences.sCn: 请收看下周精彩的一集！

sentences.sContent: ...This episode gave Doctor Mayer her first clue to something every doctor learns sooner or later-- most people just don’t listen very well...

synos.tran: 插曲；一段情节；插话；有趣的事件

trans.tranCn: 一个事件； 插曲， 片段； 连续剧的一集
trans.tranOther: a television or radio programme that is one of a series of programmes in which the same story is continued each week
